name: Finnish Marine Industries
membership:
SEA Europe
Teknologiateollisuus ry / Technology Industries of Finland
goal: Finnish Marine Industries coordinates cooperation in industrial and economic policy among the companies in the sector and promotes favorable conditions for the Finnish marine industry. AFMI is one of the branch associations of the Federation of Finnish Technology Industries.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Actions, initiatives, policies and legislative proposals related to marine industry. Trade policy and R&D.
